Pre-Game Insights: West Indies need a win against South Africa to secure a semi-final spot in the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024
South Africa is at the top of the Group 2 table with four points and a net run rate of +0.625
West Indies have a superior net run rate of +1.814 compared to England's +0.412
Others: Roston Chase was named Player of the Match for his 3/19 performance
West Indies cruised at closer to 9.5 an over during their Powerplay
West Indies defeated South Africa 3-0 in their previous series in May
